extendedInfo.description: "A new era of file sharing" - appszoom.com"The beauty of this utility is its simplicity" - redmondpie.comFinally even older devices can send files at speeds like Wi-Fi Direct!Fast File Transfer is an alternative for Bluetooth file sending.The app uses Wi-Fi Tethering for establishing a connection between the devices but does not need the Internet.Due to its high speed, this technology is especially recommended for sending big files.Features:â¢ Up to 20x speed of bluetoothâ¢ Easy to setupâ¢ The receiver is device-independentâ¢ No need for a common Wi-Fi connectionâ¢ No data usage for file transfer (Just for advertisements)â¢ The receiver does not have to have the app installedâ¢ Send single or multiple filesâ¢ Displays QR codes for faster receiving  Just tap the instruction imageâ¢ Use NFC for pairing (in beta stage)Using this app, you can easily send a file to an iPhone or any other phone that does not have Bluetooth but Wi-Fi.Will Kelly from Techrepublic wrote a tutorial on how to send files from Android to iOS: http://www.techrepublic.com/blog/smartphones/send-files-between-android-and-ios-with-fast-file-transfer/6097Simply tap "Share via" in any file exlorer or in the gallery app, choose this app and follow the on-screen instructions.How to send multiple files?Just select multiple files in your file explorer and tap "Send via" (or similar) -> "Fast File Transfer"In some file explorers first tap "Send via" in the menu, choose this app and then your files.I don't want to always enter the address on the receiver's phone!Use the built-in QR codes orSave a bookmark:Send multiple files once and add a bookmark to the file index page in your web browser. Later just open this bookmark to receive files.Where can I change the password and username?Open the app from the launcher. The instruction screen will appear. Now press the menu button and choose "Settings".PLEASE NOTE:This app might not run on some phones due to restrictions of manufacturers or carriers that make it impossible for the app to access WiFi tethering.Please don't write bad reviews because of this fact, unfortunately I cannot do anything against it. Please don't write 3-star reviews mentioning the app did not work on your device. 3-star-reviews influence the overall rating as well.!!! PLEASE CONTACT ME VIA THE "EMAIL DEVELOPER" LINK INSTEAD OF WRITING BAD REVIEWS IF YOU EXPERIENCE BUGS !!!! The app does not work on:Motorola Razr XT910 (Restarts phone; Problem in Motorola's Android implementation)Motorola Razr XT890HTC One XHTC One SHTC EVO 3D X515mSome Galaxy Y devicesDevices that don't have WiFi Tethering setting, such as the Nexus 7The transfer speed this app offers depends on the sender and receiver device. The highest value I measured is 33 Mbit/s which means 1 GB in under 5 minutes.This app uses zxing (http://code.google.com/p/zxing/) for QR code generation.Although I have never experienced such a case, I do not guarantee for any data fees caused by this app.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is the best app i have ever used for wifi transfer. It is very simple and does its work beautifully. Keep it up.
reviews.author: nick porwal

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I love this app. It was impossible for me to mount my GS3 to my macbook pro. No matter what I tried it never worked. This app worked like a charm. Transferred my video files quick and easy.
reviews.author: William Pierre

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Was extremely helpful in my old phone where I didn\'t have WiFi Direct. Now that I do have WiFi Direct, it still helps me send large files to those who don\'t have it... :D
reviews.author: Dash Watson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Transfer files faster than on my home network. No failure. 33Mb/s not bad...
reviews.author: Ronnie Roquemore

reviews.title: My new best buddy:))
reviews.comment: This app is totally amazing!!! Thanks to this app and all the people behind this. Now I can transfer all my playlist to my tablet that has no bluetooth (it has no bluetooth cause its the cheapest android tablet in the market that I can afford to buy). Thank you developers:))
reviews.author: Roslly A.

reviews.title: Great for transfering files from tablet to Kindle
reviews.comment: I have been looking for an easy good way to transfer files from my tablet to my Kindle Fire and this app does it very well. Copied a full length movie in about 5 minutes. I use both devices, Android tablet with lots of memory and Kindle with limited memory, on trips for family to share but been looking for way to get files from one to the other easily. Thank you! :-)
reviews.author: Alan Gordon

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I have tried many and found this to be the best I have found to date.  I use is to transfer large Video files (500 mb) from my Nexus 4 to my Nexus 7.  Flawless!  Transfer time is about 2 minutes for 500 mb.  If I had one wish it would be that it could share whole folders.
reviews.author: Sr. Fox Cafe Roma

reviews.title: Awesme
reviews.comment: My tablet doesn\'t have bluetooth. That\'s why I use it. It is able to transfer largefilew at great speeds. Thanks sir. 10 stars
reviews.author: Kashish Luthra

reviews.title: AWESOME-Only One Word Fellas !!!
reviews.comment: Best app.. Just go for it if your device is capable of creating wifi hotspot.
reviews.author: Subodh Bhatkar

reviews.title: Great but
reviews.comment: I\'ve used it. And it\'s great. Its rrally fast but does it really didn\'t  use mobile data?  because it seems to use it.
reviews.author: olaninie Mahamad

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Unlike Samsung\'s proprietary WiFi direct sharing, it works in every device, not just Samsung to Samsung. Finally utilizing the fast WiFi direct feature of my phone. Thanks dev.
reviews.author: Tahsin Ahmed

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Now I can send files to my Nokia Lumia 710. Also can play videos by streaming them. Good job!
reviews.author: Charitha W. S. Goonetilleke

reviews.title: Super Fast!!
reviews.comment: 3gb of gps data under 20 minutes? Certainly an evolution from bluetooth. Can you make multiple files send continuously like bluetooth? List files is hard when youre sending 100 files at a time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app !!
reviews.comment: Now i can transfer files to my pc via wifi. But only getting 1 mb speed.
reviews.author: dyenal dinesh

reviews.title: This app is the beast
reviews.comment: Deyym boss. Your creation works like a charm. This one is superb. 36-39Mbit/s ? Are you crazy? This is insane braah. This one is hella fast . Keep it up hommie.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect App
reviews.comment: A must to have app for all android users out here. Works buttery smooth on ICS & JB. I would publish it in the top must havr 10 apps in android. Cheers !!
reviews.author: Ankur Bharadwaj

reviews.title: File not sending
reviews.comment: Everything goes fine but when file transfer starts it hangs at 1%. Why ???

Thanks!!!

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.comment: This is what I looking for. It transfers files at very good speed Without using your data usage.

reviews.title: Best App.
reviews.comment: One of the best app. to transfer large file. 700MB in just 5min.
